import React from "react"; import UserAvatar0 from "../img/test-user-knight.png"; import UserAvatar1 from "../img/test-user-smiley.png"; import LikeButton from "../img/like.png"; import DislikeButton from "../img/dislike.png"; const Comment = (props) => { return(
{username}

{date}

{text}

{likes}

{dislikes}

); }; export default Comment;
